# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(join(lines, " ") * " " * word)) > text_width
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            last_line = pop!(lines)
            push!(lines, last_line * " " * word)
        end
    end

    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
s = "This function will wrap words into lines"
wrapped_s = wrap_string(s)
println(wrapped_s)
```

Output:

```
This function will wrap
words into lines
```
